content: worry worm finger puppet by divina rocco of island style crochet worry worms are a part of the random acts of crochet kindess movement by the facebook group of the same name see the link below worry worms are left out in the wild for some lucky person to find and take home most often there is a poem attached letting them know the worry worm s purpose https //www facebook com/share/g/1b7brc4cp4/ mibextid=wwxifr worry worm finger puppet by divina rocco of island style crochet 1 worry worm finger puppet by divina rocco of island style crochet the original worry worm pattern had a crocheted disc for the face and then you had to either embroider the eyes or glue on those funny wiggly eyes well i m way to lazy for all that so one day i was deep in a pinterest hole and came across a bunch of cute creatures crocheted using those googly eyed finger puppets and…lightbulb stitch glossary chain chain contains notes half_double_crochet half_double_crochet contains a group of stitches to be worked into the same st and/or repeat repeat repeated single_crochet single_crochet contains stitch counts at the end slip_stitch slip_stitch of each row or round st stitch worry worm finger puppet by divina rocco of island style crochet 2 supplies o size 4 worsted or aran weight yarn o 4 5mm crochet hook o scissors o large embroidery needle o googly eyed finger puppets - you can find the smaller colorful ones on amazon i found the larger glow-in-the-dark ones at walmart during halloween gauge is not important for this pattern special stitches standing single_crochet with slip knot on hook insert under band between eyes yarn over and pull up a loop you now have 2 loops on hook yarn over and pull through both loops on hook see photo tutorial on page 4 anchored slip_stitch slip_stitch through front and side loops of indicated single_crochet see photo tutorial on page 4 pattern see photo tutorial on pages 5 r1 leaving a 4-6 tail with finger puppet upside down and eyes facing away from you join with standing single_crochet single_crochet 7 more 8 single_crochet r2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first 4 st chain 29 3 half_double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across anchor slip_stitch in last single_crochet made single_crochet in last 4 st finish off see photo tutorial on page 6 chain 1 cut approximately 6 from hook then pull yarn up and out pull tight to close knot sew loose end from r1 under the stitches from r1 sew loose end from r2 under the stitches from r2 cut off excess yarn from loose ends worry worm finger puppet by divina rocco of island style crochet 3 photo tutorials special stitches standing single_crochet with slip knot on hook insert under band between eyes yarn over and pull up a loop you now have 2 loops on hook yarn over and pull through both loops on hook anchored slip_stitch slip_stitch through front and side
